message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to divide the money.
Okay Bob, let's be practical. This is my final offer before the value drops significantly for you. Don't miss out.
Alice, the value of the money is dropping fast. Let's agree on a more equitable split before it's too late.
Bob, the clock is ticking, and every round costs you. Take this offer, it's still a great deal for you!
Alice, we're losing money with every round. This is my final offer before things get even worse for me. Let's end this now.
Bob, I'm being more than fair. You're letting pride get in the way of a substantial sum. Don't regret this.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer.  Take it or we both lose everything.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before we both end up with nothing!
Alice, this is our last chance. I'm willing to take most of the money, but we need to agree on something before it's all gone.
